---
title: "OJS module"
---

An import from a simple module:

```{ojs}
import { nowInSecs } from './test.ojs'
nowInSecs
```

An import from a slightly more complicated module:

```{ojs}
import { out } from './test-2.ojs'
out
```

We now include a FileAttachment from a different directory to test resource resolution:

```{ojs}
data = FileAttachment("/features/penguins.csv")
```
